record.dc:title: Our Aim
record.dc:description: To build a better community with social contacts, and the upbuilding of living standards. To build a healthy community by friendly service, and preventive and corrective measures. To build an intelligent community by providing education, both formal and personal. By the safe-guarding a financial income by training in artistry, and the preservation of old crafts. Pi Beta Phi Settlement School Gatlinburg, Tennessee.
